pageContext.claim: “We're seeing a tremendous -- a tremendous difference in the fentanyl. Drug overdose deaths declined for the first time in nearly 30 years.”
pageContext.analysis: Overall drug overdose deaths have declined, but Trump specifically mentions fentanyl and his comments are false in that regard. Deaths from synthetic opioids such as fentanyl increased 10 percent from 2017 to 2018, according to the CDC.
